__e: You can stay down here for the rest of your miserable life for all I care.
For the first time in my whole miserable damn life, I am free.
And because my sister had more heart and courage on any given day than you have had in your whole miserable life!
I wondered why Karma brought me out of my coma only to make me more miserable, and I wondered, was it just gonna get worse for the rest of my life ?
She's beautiful, she's innocent, she's everything that's good in this miserable, stinking world- do you agree?
Wow, you make people miserable and there's nothing they can do about it!
